result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.

result.eng: I knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.

result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.

result.orig: feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: d'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ an mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: If that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ga: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.orig: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.html: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ponchtml: má ḃí sé sin sa ċinniúint di ḋéanfaḋ sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: If I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ga: má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.orig: má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.html: má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ponchtml: má ḃuail mé leo áfaċ ní cuiṁin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.

result.eng: If they failed, it is not known why.
result.ga: má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.orig: má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.html: má theip orthu ní fios cén fáthIf they failed, it is not known why.
result.ponchtml: má ṫeip orṫu ní fios cén fáṫIf they failed, it is not known why.

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ga: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.orig: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.html: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ponchtml: má tá teaċ mór agus culaiṫ ṁaiṫ éadaiġ aigesean altaíoḋ sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.

result.eng: I would leave them alone if it wasn't for...
result.ga: ní bhainfinn dóibh murab é
result.orig: ní bhainfinn dóibh murab é
result.html: ní bhainfinn dóibh murab éI would leave them alone if it wasn't for...
result.ponchtml: ní ḃainfinn dóiḃ murab éI would leave them alone if it wasn't for...

result.eng: You have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ga: tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.orig: tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.html: tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ponchtml: tá na páistí amú agat ó ċaiṫfiḋ mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: b'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: b'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
